# changesSelectionAsPrimaryAction

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the button represents an action or selection.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var changesSelectionAsPrimaryAction: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When a button has this property set to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the button changes to a toggle button where tapping it changes it between selected and unselected.

## Managing the action

- **primaryAction**: The action associated with the item.
- **action**: The selector defining the action message to send to the target object when the user taps this bar button item.
- **target**: The object that receives an action when the user selects the item.
